"Understood." said Naga while leaving to check the frigates.

As he entered the warehouse he checked shortly at all the ship around 
and headed for the biggest one.He get in and goes to the control 
room."500 km by second,all defense turret are laser ones..."he 
whispered to himself while checking the panels "Maybe this one will 
do the thing..." he checked all the areas,the engines,everything.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Tyrael: Thank you Talon. Shadow Star, try to find details on a war 
> cruiser. Naga, search for a patrol frigate. We have choice of either 
> heavy weaponry, armor, speed or electronic equipment. I have no idea 
> of what happened to the Predacon captured ship, so we have to expect 
> the worse. It may have rejoined a base and re-equipped with heavy 
> weaponry, which can mean a nasty fight. Our first task is to decide 
> what is our best choice. Report in as soon as you have data.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "deltazero1" <DeltaZero1@h...> wrote:
> > OCC: opps sorry about that
> > 
> > BIC: "very well then commander" talon said as his started to walk 
to
